posts.postText: I know most of you already know cause if you are on my list I think you got the link to a phishey site. I took my account back in a mere few minutes but still a lot of damage was done. I changed up passwords and haven't had any problems since *knock on wood*, but figured I should make it official since I saw talk about it on site and a lot in game. Once again I apologize to anyone affected, and sorry for inconvenience.

>>  Vanilla Crazy Cake":mm7yf1d8]
I know most of you already know cause if you are on my list I think you got the link to a phishey site. I took my account back in a mere few minutes but still a lot of damage was done. I changed up passwords and haven't had any problems since *knock on wood*, but figured I should make it official since I saw talk about it on site and a lot in game. Once again I apologize to anyone affected, and sorry for inconvenience.
 

Yeah, i alarmed you of it and told you to change passwords, what did they do?
ya i got that message. i knew it was fake though :D

>>  Vanilla Crazy Cake":21dsjuco]
I know most of you already know cause if you are on my list I think you got the link to a phishey site. I took my account back in a mere few minutes but still a lot of damage was done. I changed up passwords and haven't had any problems since *knock on wood*, but figured I should make it official since I saw talk about it on site and a lot in game. Once again I apologize to anyone affected, and sorry for inconvenience.
 

I find it kind of funny that people are STILL asking if you got hacked.  I mean, that was a little while back, and you'd think the news would of spread by now :/

Either way, it's good that you got your account back quickly, and not much harm was done :D

Luckily I fixed it quick, was lucky enough to be on when it happened so i figured something was up when gmod threw me off and said my account was in use somewhere else XD. But wouldn't of known if it was error without Rain and a few others on list messaging me what's up and even a few called. Ty everyone for help and understanding. All that happened was they sent out phising links to people on list. Was lucky they didn't do more cause email was registered on account with same password as Steam account, and my card info was saved to Steam too :O. Pretty sure it is all good now *knock on wood*
